languages.text: {n}Неторопливо вынув пистолет, Владайм произносит, вальяжно растягивая слова:{/n} "Инцендия Чорда, я, Владайм Вакемо, приказываю тебе убираться с моей территории, иначе я вышибу тебе мозги и отправлю твой труп на круг".

{n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get off my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."
languages.original_text: {n}Неторопливо вынув пистолет, Владайм произносит, вальяжно растягивая слова:{/n} "Инцендия Чорда, я, Владайм Вакемо, приказываю тебе убираться с моей территории, иначе я вышибу тебе мозги и отправлю твой труп на круг".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get out of my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆慢悠悠地掏出了手枪，以懒洋洋的语气开了口。{/n}“因森蒂娅·库尔达是吧？我是‘弗拉魔’弗拉迪姆，我命令你滚出我的地盘，否则我就一枪打爆你的脑袋，把你的尸体扔出气闸。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get off my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆慢悠悠地掏出了手枪，以懒洋洋的语气开了口。{/n}“因森蒂娅·库尔达是吧？我是‘弗拉魔’弗拉迪姆，我命令你滚出我的地盘，否则我就一枪打爆你的脑袋，把你的尸体扔出气闸。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムはゆっくりとピストルを取り出し、話し始めた。{/n}「インセンディア・チョーダ。私、ヴラダイム・ヴァッケモは、私の縄張りから出て行くことを命じる。君の脳みそを吹き飛ばし、死体を投げ飛ばす前にな」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get off my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムはゆっくりとピストルを取り出し、話し始めた。{/n}「インセンディア・チョーダ。私、ヴラダイム・ヴァッケモは、私の縄張りから出て行くことを命じる。君の脳みそを吹き飛ばし、死体を投げ飛ばす前にな」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym saca su pistola lentamente y dice:{/n} «Incendia Chorda, yo, Vladaym el Vackemo, le ordeno que salga de mi territorio antes de que le vuele los sesos y lance su cadáver por los aires».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get off my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym saca su pistola lentamente y dice:{/n} «Incendia Chorda, yo, Vladaym el Vackemo, le ordeno que salga de mi territorio antes de que le vuele los sesos y lance su cadáver por los aires».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym zieht langsam seine Waffe und sagt mit träger Stimme:{/n} "Incendia Chorda, ich, Vladaym der Vackemo, befehle Euch, aus meinem Revier zu verschwinden, bevor ich Euch das Hirn rauspuste und Eure Leiche auf Spazierflug schicke."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get off my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym zieht langsam seine Waffe und sagt mit träger Stimme:{/n} "Incendia Chorda, ich, Vladaym der Vackemo, befehle Euch, aus meinem Revier zu verschwinden, bevor ich Euch das Hirn rauspuste und Eure Leiche auf Spazierflug schicke."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym sort lentement son pistolet et dit d'une voix traînante :{/n} « Incendia Chorda... Moi, Vladaym le Vackemo, je vous ordonne de quitter mon territoire avant que je vous fasse sauter la cervelle et que j'envoie votre cadavre au rebut. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get off my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym sort lentement son pistolet et dit d'une voix traînante :{/n} « Incendia Chorda... Moi, Vladaym le Vackemo, je vous ordonne de quitter mon territoire avant que je vous fasse sauter la cervelle et que j'envoie votre cadavre au rebut. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, yavaşça tabancasını çıkarıp tembelce ve ağır ağır konuşuyor.{/n} "İncendia Chorda... Vackemo Vladaym olarak ben, beynini patlatıp cesedini deliğin birinden atmadan önce sana çöplüğümden defolmanı emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym takes out his pistol slowly and says in a lazy drawl,{/n} "Incendia Chorda, I, Vladaym the Vackemo, am ordering you to get off my turf before I blow your brains out and throw your corpse for a loop."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym yavaşça tabancasını çıkarıyor ve tembelce ve ağır ağır konuşuyor:{/n} "İncendia Chorda, ben, Vackemo Vladaym, sana, beynini patlatıp cesedini deliğin birinden atmadan önce çöplüğümden defolmanı emrediyorum."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
